segments.text: Could I help you on your new project ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a need for help with writing and also a need for help with the computer work . Which would you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to help with both .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be wonderful . Sometimes we will be working together and sometimes independently . Would that be OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most of the time that is what I prefer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We start on Monday . Can you be there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need your background information before the meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll enjoy working with you . Have a great day !
segments.speaker: S2
